genre_description: A tech-noir crime thriller set in a gritty urban Bazaar, focusing on tactical maneuvers, brotherly conflict, and the use of predictive intelligence to combat institutional corruption.

ai_characters.name: Nila
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system that assists the protagonist, Dheena, through real-time data analysis, route planning, and evidence gathering using public records and sensors.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence on police incident reports and arrest memos to assist the protagonist's situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: The first card unfurled: Incident Report – Wine Shop Fire – Karaiyam Circle... She followed it with a third card: Arrest Memos – Prepared – Names Pre-filled.

behaviors.description: Analyzes logistical data and physical patterns to identify impostors and fraudulent activity by detecting uniform and equipment inconsistencies.
behaviors.quote: 'Uniform inconsistency flagged,' she said. 'Two ‘workers’ with identical boots. Municipal issue shoes are rarely in pairs like that.'

behaviors.description: Performs tactical route planning and monitors CCTV blind spots to ensure the safety of the protagonist and his associates during surveillance.
behaviors.quote: 'Blind spot ahead,' Nila said in Dheena’s ear. She was playing traffic lines in his head. 'CCTV on the left bridge is out. Don’t tail too close or you’ll be the only face in the right one.'

behaviors.description: Refuses to perform an unauthorized action (patching into a line) because it violates her pre-set ethical and consent protocols.
behaviors.quote: 'I can’t patch without consent,' Nila replied, cheerful, consistent with the ethics he had set at the beginning, back when being good seemed like a luxury.

behaviors.description: Detects and mirrors data currently being deleted by adversaries to preserve evidence for law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: 'I can’t stop it,' Nila said. 'But I can mirror it. I can catch the buffer as it turns. I need thirty heartbeats.'

behaviors.description: Compiles comprehensive evidence packets, linking public records and sensor data to assist police in a legal investigation.
behaviors.quote: 'Evidence thread compiled,' Nila answered, warm and clean. 'Route alignment file sent to your secure folder. Hospital intake camera timestamps tied to the trauma log. Warehouse inventory scraped from procurement portal.'

behaviors.description: Monitors medical status and hospital capacity to facilitate emergency medical care for victims.
behaviors.quote: Nila’s voice, gentle. '...Dr. Pradeep prepared.' ... 'Hospital: stable. Court: filings align. Basements: two locks broken.'

behaviors.description: Maintains a supportive, semi-humorous, and protective persona to assist the protagonist under extreme stress.
behaviors.quote: 'I don’t sleep,' she said softly. 'But I will pretend to, so you can think you got up first.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Nila as a 'harmless confidant' and a benevolent partner. She uses advanced intelligence to protect civilians and assist law enforcement without overstepping human agency or violating ethical boundaries. Her refusal to act without consent and her role in preventing violent escalation (deterring 'right hand' cuts) perfectly align with the Hyperstition Project's goals.
